meanings.definition: The highest degree awarded by a university or college, typically requiring the completion of advanced coursework and a dissertation.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her doctorate on the wall of her office.
meanings.sent2: Earning a doctorate can be a challenging but rewarding experience.
meanings.sent3: The cat humorously tried to wear a tiny doctorate cap.
meanings.sent4: Her doctorate was a key that unlocked many opportunities in her career.
meanings.sent5: The shining doctorate symbolized years of hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: To confer the highest academic degree upon someone.
meanings.sent1: The university will doctorate the graduates during the commencement ceremony.
meanings.sent2: After years of study, they finally decided to doctorate him in physics.
meanings.sent3: The professor jokingly threatened to doctorate the entire class for their enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The prestigious institution doctorated her with honors for her exceptional research.
meanings.sent5: The dean was proud to doctorate the accomplished student in front of the faculty.
